messages.subject: offtopic: Danny Schmidt  Fwd: Northeast Trip - NY, NJ, VT, ME, MA
messages.msgSnippet: Please forgive this forward. I just think you would enjoy his shows if you are anywhere near these upcoming shows. This is a forward from my stalkee Danny
messages.messageBody:
Please forgive this forward. I just think you would enjoy his shows if
you are anywhere near these upcoming shows.

This is a forward from my "stalkee" Danny Schmidt. Danny is a
singer/songwriter who is absolutely brilliant. He's quiet and charming
and sweet, and he writes incredbly powerful lyrics that he puts to the
most beautiful music!

If you can get to one of these shows, I guarantee you'll fall in love
with him too---and join my "Danny Stalker Club."

You may listen to his music and read his lyrics at www.DannySchmidt.com

I really can't recommend an artist more! It's a great show! Tell him
the Lovejoys send their bext!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

-----Original Message-----
From: Danny Schmidt <danny@...>

Hi Y'all --

This email is going out to my entire email list, regardless of
geography. Just wanted to get y'all the outline for a tour I'm
starting next week in the northeast. Please pass these dates along
to anyone you know in those areas who might be interested in the
shows . . . that would be a great help to me.

And to those of you in the northeast . . . I hope to see y'all,
personally. I'll send regional-specific information as things get
closer.

All the best --
Danny

----------------------------
THE DATES
----------------------------

Wed 8/1
New York, NY
at Banjo Jim's
With my new mancrush, Nels Andrews
<a href="http://www.banjojims.com">http://www.banjojims.com</a>
<a href="http://www.nelsandrews.com">http://www.nelsandrews.com</a>

Thur 8/2
Brooklyn, NY
at Pete's Candy Store
<a
href="http://www.petescandystore.com">http://www.petescandystore.com</a>

Morristown, NJ
at The Minstrel Coffeehouse
